response.overview: Scarred by a childhood blaze that nearly claimed her detective father, GCPD analyst Barbara Gordon channels her photographic memory and makeshift gadgets into becoming the vigilante, Batgirl. When the arsonist “Firefly” sparks chaos at a political rally, she must extinguish a city‑wide inferno and expose the treachery of the Bressi crime family at Gotham’s core.
response.title: Batgirl
